group_1.textCenter: I’m really sorry for dropping the ball like that...

group_1.textRight: Well, now that your head is firmly upon your@shoulders once more,
why don't we continue brainstorming?

group_1.textLeft: Alright!
We've already got some great ideas.

group_1.textRight: Then let's review those again. You first, Rhiannon!

group_1.textLeft: It's Ria… Still, I’m used to this.
Ahem...
The crux of my idea was "fan engagement," meaning fans should be able to interact with Sayuki somehow.
Oh, me… Well, I came up with an idea where the@fans go on a video date with Sayuki.

group_1.textRight: And finally, I... [chara:303301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:303301:cheek_0][chara:303301:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:303301:motion_300][chara:303301:lipSynch_1]Um, did I even come up with@anything?

group_1.textLeft: The survival quiz, remember?

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah! The survival quiz!

group_1.textLeft: So if we factor in the manager's requests,@altogether, that gives us...

group_1.narration: "Something summer-related with@swimsuits and Mizuna"@"The sword should be involved somehow"@"Extensive fan engagement"@"Video that feels like a date"@...and "A quiz"

group_1.textLeft: What a mess. I suppose that's what I get for@trying to put it all together...
Yes, I'm not sure about this...

group_1.textRight: It's like clashing steel...

group_1.textLeft: First and foremost, there's really no rational@excuse for wearing a swimsuit in Mizuna.
There's no place to swim, after all.
And if you want Sayuki and the fans to interact,@it's hard to do that in a prerecorded video.

group_1.textRight: Prizes go naturally with quizzes, but it'd be super@tricky to make a quiz about summer...

group_1.textLeft: Because it doesn't guarantee your success, right?

group_1.textRight: Urk...

group_1.textLeft: ...Still, I doubt there's anyone who wants@that sword more than you.
The things I mentioned aren't hard@requirements, you know.
It's a special bonus feature, so we aren't@strictly limited to Mizuna as a locale.

group_1.textRight: Right. This was originally going to take@place on a deserted island, after all.
That's right, a treasure hunt on a deserted island...
It's summer, and it takes place on the beach,@so the swimsuit makes sense.
And a treasure hunt necessitates a prize@at the end.
The premise was carefully designed to have@all of its elements feel organic...

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...
How about...instead of trying to combine@everything into one,
we focus on just one core, simple concept, and@sprinkle in elements of the others wherever they fit?
If we try combining everything equally,@it just gets muddled...

group_1.textRight: You're right...! It's way easier if we shave it@down like that.

group_1.textLeft: Then let's build off of Sayuki's idea.

group_1.textRight: Wait...mine?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, yours. You really want that sword, no?

group_1.textRight: Rhiannon...!

group_1.textLeft: It's Ria...
As I was saying, a quiz show is a good way to have@you and your fans compete on the same stage.
We simply need a format that's tailored@to your advantage.
With all the different types of quizzes out there,@I'm sure we'll find one that suits you perfectly.
I knew you'd come up with a plan, Ria...!

group_1.textRight: Hmm... Quiz show... Survival... A deserted island...

group_1.textLeft: Don't get too carried away, now.
You know, the deserted island itself is@something we can work with.
Its owner seems to be a big fan of Sayu-Sayu.
He told me if by chance we ever needed it for something, we just have to say the word.

group_1.textRight: Oh, wow...! I can't thank him enough!
A quiz show on a deserted island...? It'd be quite difficult to host all the contestants we need...

group_1.textLeft: And...this is still going to be pre-recorded, right?
Won't that make it hard to have fan engagement?

group_1.textRight: Everyone... On the same stage... Having fun@together... But...I really need that sword...
Too many contestants...is a no-go...@Filming... Deserted island...

group_1.textLeft: She's getting carried away after all!

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:303301:cheek_0][chara:303301:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:303301:eyeClose_0][chara:303301:lipSynch_1]I think I got it.
What if I didn't participate in the actual quiz itself?

group_1.textLeft: Huh...? But the video is supposed to be about you!

group_1.textRight: No, it's just...what I mean is...
Please hear me out for a sec!

group_1.textLeft: Now I understand. If we do it your way, there's@no need for you to compete in the quiz.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I think we can work out the rest@ourselves.
Do you really mean it...?!

group_1.textLeft: You did it, Sayuki!

group_1.textRight: I couldn't have thought of it without you and@Rhiannon!
Thanks a million, you two!

group_1.textLeft: It's Ria...
Still, I suppose I'll accept your thanks regardless.
You two can join us at the shoot if you'd like.
Perhaps you'll think of more ideas. And besides, I@feel like things will be more fun that way, don't you?

group_1.textRight: Yes! I can't wait to work with you guys even more!
